sentences.en: A tourist guide will show you around.
sentences.cn: 一位导游将陪您到处参观.

sentences.en: A tourist was robbed after being given a drugged orange.
sentences.cn: 一名旅游者在喝了一杯被动了手脚的橙汁饮料后遭到了抢劫。

sentences.en: Beijing has a multitude of attractions to beguile the foreign tourist.
sentences.cn: 北京有许多能迷住外国旅游者的景物。

sentences.en: Beware of dishonest traders in the tourist areas.
sentences.cn: 在旅游区一定要谨防奸商。

sentences.en: Cambridge is always full of tourists in the summer.
sentences.cn: 剑桥在夏季总是挤满了游客。

sentences.en: It has a booming tourist industry.
sentences.cn: 其旅游产业在蓬勃发展。

sentences.en: Please put me through to the tourist agency.
The population explodes to 40,000 during the tourist season.
sentences.cn: 旅游季节，人口激增至4万。

sentences.en: The Statue of Liberty is a major tourist attraction .
sentences.cn: 自由女神像是主要的旅游景点。

sentences.en: The tourist office operates a useful room-finding service.
sentences.cn: 这家旅游办事处提供十分实用的住宿查询服务。

sentences.en: The town depends almost solely on the tourist trade.
sentences.cn: 这座城市几乎完全靠旅游业维持.

sentences.en: The town relies on its specific landscape for developing the tourist industry.
sentences.cn: 这个市镇凭藉独特的风光发展旅游业.

sentences.en: The town relies on the seasonal tourist industry for jobs.
sentences.cn: 这个城镇依靠季节性旅游业提供就业机会.

sentences.en: They've completely ruined the tourist trade for the next few years.
sentences.cn: 他们把今后几年的旅游业完全给毁了。

sentences.en: This money is intended for the development of the tourist industry.
sentences.cn: 这笔钱准备用于旅游业的开发。

sentences.en: Tourist numbers from across the pond have dropped dramatically.
sentences.cn: 来自大西洋彼岸的游客数量已急剧减少。

sentences.en: Travel arrangements are subject to confirmation by State Tourist Organisations.
sentences.cn: 旅行安排有待州旅游组织的确认。

sentences.en: Venice is one of the great tourist attractions of the world.
sentences.cn: 威尼斯是世界上令人向往的旅游胜地之一.

sentences.en: What effect will this have on the local tourist industry ?
sentences.cn: 这对当地的旅游业会有什么影响？

words.tran_cn: 适宜游览的；游览者喜欢的；旅游者常去的
游览车；巡回演出者；观光客
旅行；作巡回演讲（tour的ing形式）
旅行，在……旅游；在……作巡回演出

phrases.tran_cn: 旅游胜地；旅游目的地；旅游景点

trans.tran_cn: 旅行者，观光客，〈美〉冬季到南部做工的流动工人
trans.tran_en: someone who is visiting a place for pleasure on holiday
